pages.text: Marbled & Fin Welcome Welcome to Marbled & Fin, a modern steakhouse from The Neighborhood Dining Group. Following the debut of our downtown Charleston location in 2024, we are delighted to share that Marbled & Fin Savannah will open in 2026. This is fine dining, reimagined. Located in these fine Southern Cities Charleston, SC Savannah, GA Coming in Early 2026 At Marbled & Fin, every moment is crafted with intention. Celebrations unfold with ease, and each dining experience is elevated by gracious, attentive hospitality. Our menu sets the stage for premium beef, the freshest seafood, a globe-spanning wine list, and an extensive collection of spirits and whiskey â€” all set within an atmosphere designed for unforgettable evenings.
